Signup.ToSAgree: I agree to the <1>Terms of Service</1> and <3>Privacy Policy</3>

ReferralProgram.The qTrade referral program allows you t: The qTrade referral program allows you to receive 10% percent of trade commissions paid by your referrals.

ReferralProgram.howItWorks.howItWorks1: Start by visiting the <1>referrals</1> page. From this page you can copy your referral link and send it to your friends.
ReferralProgram.howItWorks.Your friends can visit the referral link: Your friends can visit the referral link and sign up for a qTrade aaccount.
ReferralProgram.howItWorks.They will then complete their account an: They will then complete their account and initiate buy or sell orders.
ReferralProgram.howItWorks.howItWorks4: At the end of the month you will recieve a credit to your account for the 10% of the trading fees your friend paid. You can view past payouts on your <1>referrals</1> page.

ReferralProgram.moreDetails.When someone clicks your link, you will: When someone clicks your link, you will get credit if they sign up any time in the next 90 days from that computer, even if they close the browser and come back later. If a user clicks someone else's referral link before signing up it will use their code
ReferralProgram.moreDetails.You may link to any page on the website: You may link to any page on the website with your referral code and it will work as expected.
ReferralProgram.moreDetails.After 1 year you will no longer recieve: After 1 year you will no longer recieve a payouts for a user referred with your code.
ReferralProgram.moreDetails.There is no limit to the number of peopl: There is no limit to the number of people you can refer, although we do reserve the right to adjust or change the referral program rules in the future.
ReferralProgram.moreDetails.Payments may not go out on the first, bu: Payments may not go out on the first, but when it does go out the payment period will be included in the payment details.
ReferralProgram.moreDetails.We check for duplicate or fake accounts: We check for duplicate or fake accounts and don't pay out referral bonuses on these accounts. Duplicate or shared financials will cause disqualification.

ReferralProgram.notice.Unfortunately we can't guarantee payout: Unfortunately we can't guarantee payout on every account you refer due to the limitations mentioned above and risk of fraud, but we make a good faith effort to do so whenever possible.
ReferralProgram.notice.In addition, qTrade reserves the right t: In addition, qTrade reserves the right to change the terms of the referral program at any time due to changing market conditions, risk of fraud, or other reasons. By participating in the referral program you acknowledge that receiving payouts is not guaranteed by qTrade

TFA.Install the Google Authenticator or Auth: Install the Google Authenticator or Authy app on your phone and scan the QR code below.Then type the provided authenticator code in below to activate.
TFA.Make a backup of the QR code or key befo: Make a backup of the QR code or key before enabling. If you lose access to your phone and do not have a backup you will lose access to your account!
TFA.recommend2FA: Enabling two factor authentication on your account is strongly recommended, as it protects your funds from being stolen by many forms of keyloggers and trojans. Once enabled, your authenticator code will be required for Withdraws, Login, Password Changes, and other privileged account actions.

Verification.Negative example selfie. No blurry pictu: Negative example selfie. No blurry pictures
Verification.Negative example selfie. No facial cover: Negative example selfie. No facial coverings
Verification.Negative ID example. Don't obscure ID: Negative ID example. Don't obscure ID
Verification.Upload a valid (non-expired) government: Upload a valid (non-expired) government issued photo ID. For faster verification we recommend US customers upload a drivers licence, and for non-US customers it's best to use your international passport.
Verification.If you are uploading your passport, the: If you are uploading your passport, the picture of it needs to include the entire passport or it will be rejected.
Verification.If any part of the ID or passport is cut: If any part of the ID or passport is cut off it is likely to be rejected
Verification.Date of Birth on your ID must have a ful: Date of Birth on your ID must have a full 4 digit year
Verification.Upload an identity verification photo (s: Upload an identity verification photo (selfie). It must include your face with no obscuring headwear (no sunglasses or hats). Face front with your face fully visible, while holding a piece of paper with the date, full name, and the word "qTrade".

AboutUs.summary: qTrade LLC is a digital asset exchange launched in April 2018 and based in the United States, registered in <1>Kansas</1>. The qTrade platform provides split-second trade execution, industry-leading security practices, and a robust, scalable architecture. Our mission is to help drive blockchain technology forward by reducing the barriers faced by innovative new and emerging technology.
AboutUs.qTrade employs the most reliable, effect: qTrade employs the most reliable, effective security technologies available. We build our own transactions to allow easy off-site signing, ensure idempotency, and leverage cold wallet storage for additional safety. qTrade also supports two-factor authentication and provides a host of additional security features to provide multiple layers of protection. At qTrade, security will always be a top priority in every decision we make.
AboutUs.Our custom trading engine was designed t: Our custom trading engine was designed to be scaled up and stress tested to ensure that orders are executed rapidly. We also support third-party trading platforms and algorithmic trading via our API
AboutUs.Fast and cheap deposits and withdrawals: Fast and cheap deposits and withdrawals
AboutUs.Our transaction monitoring and creation: Our transaction monitoring and creation platform allows us to provide users some of the fastest transactions available today. Additionally, qTrade strives to be a market leader with industry low withdrawal fees.
AboutUs.qTrade is committed to offering a wide c: qTrade is committed to offering a wide choice of assets for trading, and as part of our mission to help support emerging technology we offer many new and innovative cryptocurrencies in addition to more popular ones. We seek to provide our users with an ever-growing selection of blockchain technologies and digital tokens.
AboutUs.qTrade is committed to complying with al: qTrade is committed to complying with all current U.S. regulations that help prevent, detect and remediate unlawful behavior by customers and virtual currency developers when using the qTrade trading platform or any of the company’s other services.
AboutUs.team: The qTrade team has a strong technical background and is experienced building platforms for blockchain and cryptocurrencies. In 2014 we wrote a <1>profit switching mining pool</1> from scratch and later expanded it to perform automatic currency conversion and arbitrage for our miners.
AboutUs.Responsive support is one of our goals a: Responsive support is one of our goals and our team is available 7 days a week. At the moment we do not provide support in languages other than English, so if you are able please contact us in English.
